SELECT 'EVD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SEQ_COMMON.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') FROM DUAL

SELECT 'EVD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SEQ_COMMON.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT /* EvstDtlMap.insertCopyEvstDtl */ INTO TB_EVST_DTL (EVST_ID, EVST_NM, EVLT_QSIT_CNT, EVLT_TOTL_SCR, EVST_EXPI, BZPT_DIV , CNTR_CD, RGSR_ID, RGSN_DTTM, AMND_ID, AMNT_DTTM) SELECT #{new_evst_id}, SUBSTRB(EVST_NM, 1, 93) || '_복사', EVLT_QSIT_CNT, EVLT_TOTL_SCR, EVST_EXPI, BZPT_DIV , CNTR_CD, #{rgsr_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{amnd_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FROM TB_EVST_DTL WHERE EVST_ID = #{evst_id}
